channel.title: Comments on: I review PlayStation games assigned to me by a random number generator. This week I was cursed with Zombie Driver.

item.title: By: fuckfcbauerninzest
item.dc:creator: fuckfcbauerninzest
item.description: that's a cool concept, so much weird little titles on there
item.content:encoded: that’s a cool concept, so much weird little titles on there

item.title: By: DittoDat
item.dc:creator: DittoDat
item.description: Cursed? I've never played it but I have it on a list of games to buy when on sale. Is it that bad? (Haven't watched the video)
item.content:encoded: Cursed? I’ve never played it but I have it on a list of games to buy when on sale. Is it that bad? (Haven’t watched the video)

item.title: By: armypantsnflipflops
item.dc:creator: armypantsnflipflops
item.description: I got this game for free cause I claimed the PS3 version when it was a PS+ giveaway, but I’ve yet to try either version. One day I’ll get to it, and judging from the reception, I’m not in much of a rush
item.content:encoded: I got this game for free cause I claimed the PS3 version when it was a PS+ giveaway, but I’ve yet to try either version. One day I’ll get to it, and judging from the reception, I’m not in much of a rush
